topic.title: Aplication Configuration
topic.shortdesc: The application can be configured from the Preferences page.

body.p: You can configured application options using the Preferences dialog box.

You can selection the preference page you is interested in from the tree on the left of the Preferences dialog box. You can filter the tree bye using the filter text box and then the following buttons are available to the right of the text box:
Expand All - Expands the structure of the tree to show all preference pages.
Collapse All - Collapses the structure of the tree to show only the 1st level preference pages.
Project-Level Options Only - If toggled on it filters the tree to only show the preference pages that are saved at project level.
Some preference pages include an option to control how the options are stored either as Global Options or Project Options.
You can restore options to their default values by pressing the Restore Defaults button available in each preferences page.
